name: Fruit Hunter Beta
description:
Fruit Hunter is a survival infinite fruit collection hyper-casual game. The aim of the game is to collect fruits as they grow and falling from the tree. While the fruits grow, some becomes rotten so player must avoid the rotten fruits to have a chance of staying alive in the game. The survival aspect of the game is the HP system that keeps the player alive in the game. Each time you collect a rotten fruit, the HP is reduced by 1, player has maximum of +3 HP.

Challenge your friend with your highest score.
